mapper.sql: id, host, resolve_type, line_isp, value, ttl, domain_id, priority, status, remark, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_resolution where domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into erm_dns_private_resolution (id, host, resolve_type, line_isp, value, ttl, domain_id, priority, status, remark, del_flag, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resolveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineIsp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update erm_dns_private_resolution set host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resolve_type = #{resolveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_isp = #{lineIsp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ttl = #{ttl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from erm_dns_private_resolution where del_flag!=1
AND `host` LIKE CONCAT('%','${host}','%')
AND domain_id = #{domainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
